changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.ModuleId, T1.ModuleName, T1.SubModuleName, T1.TabHeading, T1.NumberOfColumns , T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId ,POSTVALIDATION,PREVALIDATION,POSTVALIDATIONREQ,PREVALIDATIONREQ FROM ExtendedFieldHeader_TEMP T1 UNION ALL SELECT T1.ModuleId, T1.ModuleName, T1.SubModuleName, T1.TabHeading, T1.NumberOfColumns , T1.Version , T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId ,POSTVALIDATION,PREVALIDATION,POSTVALIDATIONREQ,PREVALIDATIONREQ FROM ExtendedFieldHeader T1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ExtendedFieldHeader_TEMP WHERE ModuleId = T1.ModuleId)

changeSet.author: DurgaPrasad G
